data.text:
Blue Kite Shield is a weapon available in Dragon's Dogma.

Description[]

"A shield fashioned for the express purpose of magick infusion. Well known as standard equipment among Gran Soren's knights."

The Thunder Kite Shield is a lightning enchanted version of this weapon.
